answers.answer: Have they tested for latten preeclampsia, that happened with my first, instant weight gain, sudden swelling etc no signs of it until the very very end.
Actually they thought I had preeclampsia last week because I have been swelling but they said my blood work and urine looked good. What if I do have preeclampsia afterall what will happen?
Depending how bad they may induce you or you will have a c-section.

question: Hello im 39 weeks Friday I will be 40 weeks. I went to the doctor yesterday and she said im measuring 37/38 weeks but every other time I measured right on and I gained 5pounds in less than four days .has this happen to anybody else and baby was fine I have ultrasound tomorrow and im a ftm sorry just nervous she said im gaining weight real fast all of a sudden. I weighed 116 now 175
title: curious ftm
